path: artifacts/EverCoom Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.EverCoom: contracts/EverCoom Full Smart Contract Security Audit/EverCoom

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function `includeInReward()` uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the `_excluded` list, which can lead to an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are many excluded addresses.
